Trolley Race.name: Trolley Race
Trolley Race.description: DCU Karting are hosting a trolley race on DCU's Glasnevin campus in aid of charities! Get yourself a team member and sign up today for your chance to be crowned victor!

Lyons Trip.name: Karting Lyons Trip
Lyons Trip.description: We're heading to Lyons Karting in Armagh for our second trip of this semester. It is â‚¬35 per person and we plan to leave the helix for 10am so get to the meeting point around 15 minutes early. We expect to return by 6pm. Hope to see you there!
